scores.translation: Cherry blossom viewing, also known as "hanami," has been a Japanese tradition since the 8th century.
Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of the Buddha but has been expanded through the universal love of Mahayana Buddhism and many techniques of Indian yoga.
This concept originates from China, where the plum blossom is a beloved flower among the Chinese people.
In Japan, the earliest cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor for himself and other noble members of the imperial family at the Imperial Palace.
Indonesia has 17,000 islands, so Indonesian cuisine is just a general term that encompasses a wide variety of regional dishes across the country.

Now, Javanese cuisine can be found all over the islands, featuring many dishes with simple seasoning methods. The main seasonings favored by the Javanese include peanuts, chili peppers, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar), and various spices.
Since 1966, the Sundarbans has been a wildlife sanctuary. It is estimated that the area is currently home to 400 Royal Bengal Tigers and approximately 30,000 spotted deer.
The Great Pyramid of Giza is the only structure among the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World that still stands today.
The ancient city of Machu Picchu consists of three main buildings: the Intihuatana (Hitching Post of the Sun), the Temple of the Sun, and the House of the Three Windows.
Kruger National Park (KNP) is located in the northeastern part of South Africa, bordering Mozambique to the east, Zimbabwe to the north, and the Crocodile River to the south.
Reindeer herding is an important livelihood for the Sami people. The culture surrounding this industry is also significant to many who make a living through other professions.
The Amazon River is the second longest and the largest river in the world. Its water volume is more than eight times that of the second largest river.
The Sundarbans is the world's largest coastal mangrove belt, stretching 80 kilometers (50 miles) from the coast into the inland areas of Bangladesh and India.
Western knowledge of Taiwan dates back to the 15th century. At that time, European sailors passing by named the island "Ilha Formosa," meaning beautiful island.
There is no unified definition for which processed items are considered antiques. Some tax authorities define items over 100 years old as antiques.
